Persib Bandung Vs PSIS Semarang: Ardi dan Ezechiel Bisa Main
05 Nov 2019, 07:42 by Aminuddin, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Bandung - Pelatih kepala Persib Bandung, Robert Rene Alberts, mengatakan Ardi Idrus dan Ezechiel N'Douassel tengah pulih dari cedera yang dialaminya dan siap diturunkan saat Persib menjamu PSIS Semarang, di Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Kabupaten Bandung, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Sebelumnya, pasca laga kontra Kalteng Putra, Ezechiel dan Ardi Idrus mengalami cedera dan harus absen dari latihan yang digelar Persib. Ezechiel bermasalah di bagian paha. Ardi mengalami bengkak di bagian mata kakinya.
"Ardi dan Ezechiel sudah kembali bergabung dalam latihan pagi tadi, mereka terlihat positif dan mereka siap (main)," ujar Robert saat ditemui di Graha Persib, Jalan Sulanjana, Kota Bandung, Rabu, 5 November 2019.
Robert mengatakan laga kontra PSIS akan menjadi laga yang menarik lantaran kedua tim sama-sama ngotot ingin memenangkan pertandingan. Persib pasti mau mengamankan tiga poin saya bermain di kandangnya sendiri. Sementara Laskar Mahesa Jenar harus mengumpulkan poin guna terlepas dari zona papan bawah klasemen Liga 1.
"Akan menjadi laga yang menarik besok karena PSIS adalah tim tangguh dengan penyerangan yang berbahaya dan mempunyai pemain asing sangat bagus. Mereka sangat mobil berkombinasi dengan baik," katanya.
Apalagi, kata dia, PSIS kini tampil dengan beberapa pemain barunya yang dinilai cukup mampu membawa perubahan di tubuh Laskar Mahesa Jenar. PSIS dihuni oleh dua penggawa asing baru yakni Caludir Marini Junior dan Jonathan Cantillana.
"Tim lawan punya pemain tambahan dan itu positif untuk mereka, apalagi mereka sudah saling mengerti satu sama lain. Tapi, kami sudah bersiap dan memahami bagaimana cara mereka bermain," ujarnya.
Persib Bandung kini menempati peringkat kedelapan klasemen sementara Liga 1 dengan torehan 34 poin dari 25 pertandingan. PSIS bercokol di peringkat 13 klasemen dengan 28 poin.

AMINUDDIN A.S.

Persib Bandung Vs PSIS Semarang: Ardi and Ezechiel Can Play
05 Nov 2019, 07:42 by Aminuddin, Hari Prasetyo
TEMPO.CO, Bandung - Head coach of Persib Bandung, Robert Rene Alberts, said Ardi Idrus and Ezechiel N'Douassel were recovering from their injuries and were ready to be revealed when Persib hosted PSIS Semarang, at Si Jalak Harupat Stadium, Bandung Regency, Wednesday, 6 November 2019.
Previously, after the fight against Kalteng Putra, Ezechiel and Ardi Idrus suffered injuries and had to be absent from training held by Persib. Ezechiel has a problem with his thigh. Ardi experienced swelling in the ankles.
"Ardi and Ezechiel have rejoined training this morning, they look positive and they are ready (to play)," Robert said when met at Graha Persib, Jalan Sulanjana, Bandung City, Wednesday, 5 November 2019.
Robert said the PSIS counter-match would be an interesting match because the two teams were both determined to win the match. Persib would want to secure the three points I play at home. While Laskar Mahesa Jenar must collect points in order to be separated from the bottom zone of the League 1 table.
"It will be an interesting match tomorrow because PSIS is a tough team with dangerous attacks and has very good foreign players. They are very well-combined cars," he said.
Moreover, he said, PSIS is now performing with some of its new players who are considered capable enough to bring changes in the Laskar Mahesa Jenar's body. PSIS is inhabited by two new foreign workers namely Caludir Marini Junior and Jonathan Cantillana.
"The opposing team has additional players and that is positive for them, moreover they already understand each other. But, we have prepared and understood how they play," he said.
Persib Bandung is now ranked eighth in the League 1 standings with 34 points from 25 matches. PSIS is ranked 13th in the standings with 28 points.

AMINUDDIN U.S.
